key.name: disable-indicator
key.description: If TRUE, the indicator is disabled. Require re-login.

key.name: started-the-first-time
key.summary: Indicator is started the first time
key.description: If the Indicator is started the first time, then the value is TRUE.

key.name: tray-is-static
key.summary: The tray is displayed in the "show always"
key.description: If you want to display the Tray in the "show always", then the value is TRUE.

key.name: static-x
key.description: Position X when in mode "show always".

key.name: static-y
key.description: Position Y when in mode "show always".

key.name: show-background-static
key.summary: Show the background for static Systemtray
key.description: To display a background value must be TRUE.

key.name: rgba-static
key.description: The color of the Systemtray background. (0 - 255,...)

key.name: rgba-static-stroke
key.description: The color of the Systemtray background. (0 - 255,...)

key.name: show-background-floating
key.summary: Show the background for floating Systemtray
key.description: To display a background value must be TRUE.

key.name: rgba-floating
key.description: The color of the Systemtray background. (0 - 255,...)

key.name: rgba-floating-stroke
key.description: The color of the Systemtray background. (0 - 255,...)
